resources.string: This app helps the annoying disconnection issue that happens between Android 10 and Pebble 2 SE and HR. By trial and error, users have found that forgetting the Pebble from the Bluetooth paired device list triggers the pairing on the watch which connects the device once again. Instead of manually doing so, this apps checks if the Pebble is paired and disconnected, and forgets it in the background so the only thing left to do is to accept the pairing on your Pebble. Click the below button to try!
